Uses of Class
common.ImageRandomAccessWriter

  • Packages that use ImageRandomAccessWriter 
    Package Description
    heif
    Provides high-level classes for parsing and manipulating HEIF-based files.
    jpg
    Classes for parsing and manipulating JPEG-based files are found here.
    png
    Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.
    webp  

    • Uses of ImageRandomAccessWriter in heif

      Methods in heif with parameters of type ImageRandomAccessWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void HeifDatePatcher.processExifSegment(BoxHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter raf, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Iterates through the Exif TIFF structure and patches date tags.
      private static void HeifDatePatcher.processXmpSegment(BoxHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt, boolean xmpDump)
      Overwrites XMP date-time strings directly within the HEIF file's media data.

    • Uses of ImageRandomAccessWriter in jpg

      Methods in jpg with parameters of type ImageRandomAccessWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void JpgDatePatcher.processExifSegment(ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, int length, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Patches the ASCII date tags and binary GPS time-stamp rationals if they are present within an EXIF segment.
      private static void JpgDatePatcher.processXmpSegment(ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, int length, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Scans the XMP XML content for date-related tags and overwrites their values.

    • Uses of ImageRandomAccessWriter in png

      Methods in png with parameters of type ImageRandomAccessWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void PngDatePatcher.processExifSegment(ChunkHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Surgically patches date tags within the eXIf chunk by parsing the embedded TIFF structure.
      private static void PngDatePatcher.processTextualChunk(ChunkHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Surgically patches standard tEXt chunks to update date-related keywords.
      private static void PngDatePatcher.processTimeSegment(ChunkHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Surgically patches the standard PNG tIME chunk using a 7-byte big-endian representation.
      private static void PngDatePatcher.processXmpSegment(ChunkHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt, boolean xmpDump)
      Scans XML content within iTXt chunks for date tags and performs binary overwrites.
      private static void PngDatePatcher.updateChunkCRC(ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, PngChunk chunk, byte[] updatedPayload)
      Updates the CRC checksum for a specific chunk to ensure the file remains valid after a surgical patch.

    • Uses of ImageRandomAccessWriter in webp

      Methods in webp with parameters of type ImageRandomAccessWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void WebPDatePatcher.processExifSegment(WebpHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Surgically patches date tags within the eXIf chunk by parsing the embedded TIFF structure.
      private static void WebPDatePatcher.processXmpSegment(WebpHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt, boolean xmpDump)
      Scans XML content within WebP 'XMP ' chunks for date tags and performs binary overwrites.
